description: This was my first opportunity to work professionally, I work here while a sophomore in visual communication design. I do a lot of work such as editorial photography, motion graphics, and UI/UX. Enjoy all the work because I can directly apply the knowledge taught at university to the real world. During those works, I also responsible to maintain brand image for each company products with my partner and owner.

scope: Editorial Photography & Videography, Motion Graphic, Branding, Event & Community

Type Design Club is a learning space created by Tegamitype Foundry and The Public Case which is aimed at introducing the discipline of letter design in Indonesia. Since 2022, they have been holding 2 class programs, namely Latin and Javanese classes. Apart from sharing knowledge, they hope that the Type Design Club can also be a place to develop the interest and spirit of collaboration in the typography community in Indonesia.
